DDL Generator

Packages
org.castor.ddl This package contains functional classes, exceptions and Main class for DDL generator
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.db2 This package contains final classes to create DDL for Db2
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.db2.schemaobject This package contains final schemaobject classes for DB2
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.derby This package contains final classes to create DDL for Derby
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.derby.schemaobject This package contains final schemaobject classes for Derby
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.hsql This package contains final classes to create DDL for Hsql
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.hsql.schemaobject This package contains final schemaobject classes for Hsql
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.mssql This package contains final classes to create DDL for Microsoft SQL Server
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.mssql.schemaobject This package contains final schemaobject classes for Microsoft SQL Server
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.mysql This package contains final classes to create DDL for MySQL
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.mysql.schemaobject This package contains final schemaobject classes for MySQL
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.oracle This package contains final classes to create DDL for Oracle
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.oracle.schemaobject This package contains final schemaobject classes for Oracle
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.pointbase This package contains final classes to create DDL for PointBase
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.pointbase.schemaobject This package contains final schemaobject classes for PointBase
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.postgresql This package contains final classes to create DDL for PostgreSQL
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.postgresql.schemaobject This package contains final schemaobject classes for PostgreSQL
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.sapdb This package contains final classes to create DDL for SapDB
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.sapdb.schemaobject This package contains final schemaobject classes for SapDB
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.schemaobject This package contains SchemaObject for ddl creation including Table, Field, KeyGenerator, Index, Schema and KeyRepository.
org.castor.ddl.sybase This package contains final classes to create DDL for Sybase
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.sybase.schemaobject This package contains final schemaobject classes for Sybase
Author: Le Duc Bao
org.castor.ddl.typeinfo This package contains various types' definition.
